pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:5.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:5.2: Tena kho pana samayena thullanandā bhikkhunī saṃghena samanubhaṭṭhā bhikkhuniyo evaṃ vadeti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:5.3: “saṃsaṭṭhāva, ayye, tumhe viharatha. Mā tumhe nānā viharittha.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:5.4: Santi saṃghe aññāpi bhikkhuniyo evācārā evaṃsaddā evaṃsilokā, bhikkhunisaṃghassa vihesikā, aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā. Tā saṃgho na kiñci āha.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:5.5: Tumhaññeva saṃgho uññāya paribhavena akkhantiyā vebhassiyā dubbalyā evamāha— ‘bhaginiyo kho saṃsaṭṭhā viharanti pāpācārā pāpasaddā pāpasilokā, bhikkhunisaṃghassa vihesikā, aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā. Viviccathāyye. Vivekaññeva bhaginīnaṃ saṃgho vaṇṇetī’”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:6.1: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā … pe … tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:6.2: “kathañhi nāma ayyā thullanandā saṃghena samanubhaṭṭhā bhikkhuniyo evaṃ vakkhati—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:6.3: saṃsaṭṭhāva, ayye, tumhe viharatha. Mā tumhe nānā viharittha.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:6.5: viviccathāyye. Vivekaññeva bhaginīnaṃ saṃgho vaṇṇetīti” … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:6.6: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī saṃghena samanubhaṭṭhā bhikkhuniyo evaṃ vadeti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:6.7: saṃsaṭṭhāva, ayye, tumhe viharatha. Mā tumhe nānā viharittha.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:6.8: Santi saṃghe aññāpi bhikkhuniyo evācārā evaṃsaddā evaṃsilokā, bhikkhunisaṃghassa vihesikā, aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā. Tā saṃgho na kiñci āha.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:6.9: Tumhaññeva saṃgho uññāya paribhavena akkhantiyā vebhassiyā dubbalyā evamāha— bhaginiyo kho saṃsaṭṭhā viharanti pāpācārā pāpasaddā pāpasilokā, bhikkhunisaṃghassa vihesikā, aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā. Viviccathāyye. Vivekaññeva bhaginīnaṃ saṃgho vaṇṇetī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:6.12: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī saṃghena samanubhaṭṭhā bhikkhuniyo evaṃ vakkhati—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:6.13: saṃsaṭṭhāva, ayye, tumhe viharatha. Mā tumhe nānā viharittha.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:6.16: Netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:6.17: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:7.2: ‘saṃsaṭṭhāva, ayye, tumhe viharatha. Mā tumhe nānā viharittha.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:7.3: Santi saṃghe aññāpi bhikkhuniyo evācārā evaṃsaddā evaṃsilokā, bhikkhunisaṃghassa vihesikā, aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā. Tā saṃgho na kiñci āha.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:7.4: Tumhaññeva saṃgho uññāya paribhavena akkhantiyā vebhassiyā dubbalyā evamāha— bhaginiyo kho saṃsaṭṭhā viharanti pāpācārā pāpasaddā pāpasilokā, bhikkhunisaṃghassa vihesikā, aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā. Viviccathāyye. Vivekaññeva bhaginīnaṃ saṃgho vaṇṇetī’ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:7.7: saṃsaṭṭhāva, ayye, tumhe viharatha. Mā tumhe nānā viharittha.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:7.8: Santi saṃghe aññāpi bhikkhuniyo evācārā evaṃsaddā evaṃsilokā, bhikkhunisaṃghassa vihesikā, aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā. Tā saṃgho na kiñci āha.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:7.9: Tumhaññeva saṃgho uññāya paribhavena akkhantiyā vebhassiyā dubbalyā evamāha— bhaginiyo kho saṃsaṭṭhā viharanti pāpācārā pāpasaddā pāpasilokā, bhikkhunisaṃghassa vihesikā, aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā. Viviccathāyye. Vivekaññeva bhaginīnaṃ saṃgho vaṇṇetī’ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:7.10: Evañca sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi vuccamānā tatheva paggaṇheyya, sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsitabbā tassa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:7.11: Yāvatatiyañce samanubhāsīyamānā taṃ paṭinissajjeyya, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ;
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:7.12: no ce paṭinissajjeyya, ayampi bhikkhunī yāvatatiyakaṃ dhammaṃ āpannā nissāraṇīyaṃ saṃghādisesan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:8.4: … pe … ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:9.2: “saṃsaṭṭhāva, ayye, tumhe viharatha. Mā tumhe nānā viharittha.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:9.3: Santi saṃghe aññāpi bhikkhuniyo evācārā evaṃsaddā evaṃsilokā, bhikkhunisaṃghassa vihesikā, aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā. Tā saṃgho na kiñci āha”.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:15.2: “bhaginiyo kho saṃsaṭṭhā viharanti pāpācārā pāpasaddā pāpasilokā, bhikkhunisaṃghassa vihesikā, aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:17.2: aññāhi bhikkhunīhi. Yā passanti yā suṇanti tāhi vattabbā—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:18.3: ‘saṃsaṭṭhāva, ayye, tumhe viharatha. Mā tumhe nānā viharittha.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:18.13: ‘saṃsaṭṭhāva, ayye, tumhe viharatha. Mā tumhe nānā viharittha.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:19.3: Santi saṃghe aññāpi bhikkhuniyo evācārā evaṃsaddā evaṃsilokā, bhikkhunisaṃghassa vihesikā, aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:19.5: Tumhaññeva saṃgho uññāya paribhavena akkhantiyā vebhassiyā dubbalyā evamāha—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:19.6: bhaginiyo kho saṃsaṭṭhā viharanti pāpācārā pāpasaddā pāpasilokā, bhikkhunisaṃghassa vihesikā aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:19.10: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuniṃ samanubhāseyya tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:19.13: Ayaṃ itthannāmā bhikkhunī saṃghena samanubhaṭṭhā bhikkhuniyo evaṃ vadeti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:19.16: Santi saṃghe aññāpi bhikkhuniyo evācārā evaṃsaddā evaṃsilokā, bhikkhunisaṃghassa vihesikā, aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:19.18: Tumhaññeva saṃgho uññāya paribhavena akkhantiyā vebhassiyā dubbalyā evamāha—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:19.19: bhaginiyo kho saṃsaṭṭhā viharanti pāpācārā pāpasaddā pāpasilokā, bhikkhunisaṃghassa vihesikā aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:19.23: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuniṃ samanubhāseyya tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:20.3: Santi saṃghe aññāpi bhikkhuniyo evācārā evaṃsaddā evaṃsilokā, bhikkhunisaṃghassa vihesikā, aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:20.5: Tumhaññeva saṃgho uññāya paribhavena akkhantiyā vebhassiyā dubbalyā evamāha—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:20.6: bhaginiyo kho saṃsaṭṭhā viharanti pāpācārā pāpasaddā pāpasilokā, bhikkhunisaṃghassa vihesikā, aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:20.10: Saṃgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuniṃ samanubhāsati tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:20.11: Yassā ayyāya khamati itthannāmāya bhikkhuniyā samanubhāsanā tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya, sā tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:20.14: Ayaṃ itthannāmā bhikkhunī saṃghena samanubhaṭṭhā bhikkhuniyo evaṃ vadeti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:20.17: Santi saṃghe aññāpi bhikkhuniyo evācārā evaṃsaddā evaṃsilokā, bhikkhunisaṃghassa vihesikā, aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:20.19: Tumhaññeva saṃgho uññāya paribhavena akkhantiyā vebhassiyā dubbalyā evamāha—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:20.20: bhaginiyo kho saṃsaṭṭhā viharanti pāpācārā pāpasaddā pāpasilokā, bhikkhunisaṃghassa vihesikā, aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:20.24: Saṃgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuniṃ samanubhāsati tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:20.25: Yassā ayyāya khamati itthannāmāya bhikkhuniyā samanubhāsanā tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya, sā tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:22.1: Samanubhaṭṭhā saṃghena itthannāmā bhikkhunī tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:22.2: Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:23.2: Saṃghādisesaṃ ajjhāpajjantiyā ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ, dvīhi kammavācāhi thullaccayā paṭippassambhanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:27.2: saṃghova tassā āpattiyā mānattaṃ deti, mūlāya paṭikassati, abbheti, na sambahulā na ekā bhikkhunī. Tena vuccati “saṃghādiseso”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:27.3: Tasseva āpattinikāyassa nāmakammaṃ adhivacanaṃ, tenapi vuccati “saṃghādiseso”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:28.1: Dhammakamme dhammakammasaññā na paṭinissajjati, āpatti saṃghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:28.2: Dhammakamme vematikā na paṭinissajjati, āpatti saṃghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:28.3: Dhammakamme adhammakammasaññā na paṭinissajjati, āpatti saṃghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:33.1: Uddiṭṭhā kho, ayyāyo, sattarasa saṃghādisesā dhammā—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:33.3: Yesaṃ bhikkhunī aññataraṃ vā aññataraṃ vā āpajjati, tāya bhikkhuniyā ubhatosaṃghe pakkhamānattaṃ caritabbaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:33.4: Ciṇṇamānattā bhikkhunī yattha siyā vīsatigaṇo bhikkhunisaṃgho tattha sā bhikkhunī abbhetabbā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:33.5: Ekāyapi ce ūno vīsatigaṇo bhikkhunisaṃgho taṃ bhikkhuniṃ abbheyya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:33.6: Sā ca bhikkhunī anabbhitā, tā ca bhikkhuniyo gārayhā, ayaṃ tattha sāmīci.
